name: Infrastructure Team
description: Responsible for physical and cloud infrastructure (servers, networks, VMs, etc.). Manages cloud infrastructure recovery on AWS, data center power outage recovery.

name: Database Team
description: Manages all data storage systems, backups, and replication. Specializes in PostgreSQL recovery, database failover procedures, and production data restoration from snapshots.

name: Application/DevOps Team
description: Focuses on CI/CD pipelines, app deployment, and service orchestration. Manages microservices deployment, Docker/Kubernetes operations, and application rollback.

name: Security & Compliance Team
description: Handles access control, breach response, and regulatory compliance. Manages ransomware response, credential rotation, forensics, and security incident management.
